DOC.brief_summary: Colonoscopy withdrawal time critical element determine quality colonoscopy ; however , study evaluate specific factor may influence duration withdrawal , specifically short withdrawal time . Other factor affect polyp detection rate , one element quality colonoscopy , also need study . By collect data hundred colonoscopy perform 9 endoscopists , goal identify factor associate withdrawal time , inappropriately short withdrawal time , polyp detection rate colonoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: Factors Associated With Short Withdrawal Time Polyp Detection Rate During Colonoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: Background : Colonoscopy withdrawal time critical element determine quality colonoscopy ; however , study evaluate specific factor may influence duration withdrawal , specifically short withdrawal time . Other factor affect polyp detection rate , one element quality colonoscopy , also need study . Objective : To identify factor associate withdrawal time , inappropriately short withdrawal time , polyp detection rate colonoscopy . Design : Data prospectively collect ( 05/08-06/09 ) 802 colonoscopy conduct 9 blinded endoscopists , include patient age sex , indication , colonoscope insertion withdrawal time , biopsy perform , number/size polyp method resection , bowel preparation quality , time day , day week , endoscopist , position procedure within endoscopist 's slate , call status endoscopist . Setting : This study conduct single tertiary care hospital , St. Paul 's Hospital , Vancouver , British Columbia .
DOC.criteria: All adult patient undergo colonoscopy St. Paul 's Hospital Vancouver , BC . Exclusion criterion prior colon resection repeat colonoscopy purpose endoscopic therapy know lesion .
